original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2286)@ 在武將四周，召喚出15隻<color=#4cc769>屍鬼</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。 <color=#4cc769>屍鬼</color>屬性 <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1286)@ 武力值：$Soldier_Str(1286)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2286)@ Around the generals, 15 <color=#4cc769> ghouls</color> were summoned to attack nearby enemies. <color=#4cc769>Ghouls</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Stamina value: </color>$Soldier_HP(1286)@ Force value:  $Soldier_Str(1286)@
